entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
